description:
After I installed nova-compute on a different marchine with nova-network, I failed to run instance due to error "command vconfig is not found". And the vconfig is included in package vlan. So I think the vlan package should be added in nova-compute dependencies.

Thanks.
title: Package vlan should be included in nova-compute's dependencies

comments.content:
After I installed nova-compute on a different marchine with nova-network, I failed to run instance due to error "command vconfig is not found". And the vconfig is included in package vlan. So I think the vlan package should be added in nova-compute dependencies.

Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~guanxiaohua2k6

comments.content: I used ppa:nova-core/trunk. And OS is ubuntu 10.10.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~guanxiaohua2k6

comments.content: This is fixed in the debian packaging now.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zulcss

comments.content: Can this be sru'ed to natty? :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tellis

comments.content:
But what if the user will not using Vlan mode ?
I think just add a remind in doc would be enough

Hugo Kuo

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tonytkdk

comments.content: The problem is that VLAN is the default network mode in OpenStack.  We ought to support the default settings "out of the box".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~marrusl
